original_text: Then he brought me to the north gate, and he measured it. It had the same size as the others.
korean_text: 그가 또 나를 데리고 북문에 이르러 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me to the north gate
It had the same size as the others.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 문들과 동일한 크기를 가졌습니다
